mapper.insert: insert into Reward (p_index, m_id, r_name, r_price, r_img, r_contents, ct_index, r_start, r_option, r_del, r_amt) values(#{p_index}, #{m_id}, #{r_name}, #{r_price}, #{r_img}, #{r_contents}, #{ct_index}, #{r_start}, #{r_option}, #{r_del}, #{r_amt})
mapper.update: update Reward set r_name=#{r_name}, r_price=#{r_price}, r_img=#{r_img}, r_contents=#{r_contents}, ct_index=#{ct_index}, r_start=#{r_start}, r_option=#{r_option}, r_del=#{r_del}, r_amt=#{r_amt} where r_index=#{r_index}
